```{r Selecting all data from Casetrack Table}
myQuery = "SELECT * from `SFDUMMY`;"
dat = dbGetQuery(dbConn, myQuery)
data.frame(dat)

summary(dat)
str(dat)
```

```{r Find Crimes by Keywords}
comments = dat$Comments

type = c("drugs", "stab", "gun")
amount[1] = sum(table(grep("marijuana|pot|narcotics|drug|meth|pills", comments)))
amount[2] = sum(table(grep("stab|knife", comments)))
amount[3] = sum(table(grep("shot|shoot|gun", comments)))

crime.type = data.frame(type, amount)
barplot(crime.type$amount, horiz=TRUE, las=1, xlab="Amount of Crimes")
```

```{r}
## Splitting location into latitude and longitude
dat = dat %>% extract(Location, c("Latitude", "Longitude"), "\\(([^,]+), ([^)]+)\\)")
dat$Longitude <- round(as.numeric(dat$Longitude), 2)
dat$Latitude <- round(as.numeric(dat$Latitude), 2)
```


```{r}
## generating heat map 
sf = get_map(location= "san francisco", zoom = 13)
ggmap(sf)


locationCrimes = as.data.frame(table(dat$Longitude, dat$Latitude))
names(locationCrimes) = c("long", "lat", "Frequency")
locationCrimes$long = as.numeric(as.character(locationCrimes$long))
locationCrimes$lat = as.numeric(as.character(locationCrimes$lat))

ggmap(sf) + geom_tile(data=locationCrimes, aes(x = long, y = lat, alpha = Frequency), 
                      fill = "red") + theme(axis.title.y = element_text(), 
                                            axis.title.x = element_text())


```

```{r}
times = dat$Time
dat$Hour = substr(times, 1, 2)

locationCrimesDay = as.data.frame(table(dat$Longitude[dat$Time<17], 
                                    dat$Latitude[dat$Time<17]))

names(locationCrimesDay) = c("long", "lat", "Frequency")
locationCrimesDay$long = as.numeric(as.character(locationCrimesDay$long))
locationCrimesDay$lat = as.numeric(as.character(locationCrimesDay$lat))


ggmap(sf) + geom_tile(data=locationCrimesDay, aes(x = long, y = lat, alpha = Frequency),
                            fill = "red") + theme(axis.title.y = element_text(), 
                                                  axis.title.x = element_text())
```

```{r Reading in data from Database}
myQuery1 = "SELECT * from `Monterey_Pub`;"
dat1 = dbGetQuery(dbConn, myQuery1)
data.frame(dat1)

summary(dat1)
str(dat1)
```


```{r}
dat1 = dat1 %>% extract(location, c("Latitude", "Longitude"), "\\(([^,]+), ([^)]+)\\)")
dat1$longitude = round(as.numeric(dat1$longitude), 2)
dat1$latitude = round(as.numeric(dat1$latitude), 2)

dat1$longitude["longitude"==0] = NA
dat1$latitude["latitude"==0] = NA


montereyCrimes = as.data.frame(table(dat1$latitude, dat1$longitude))

names(montereyCrimes) = c("long", "lat", "Frequency")
```



```{r}
monterey = get_map(location= "monterey county", zoom = 9)
ggmap(monterey)

ggmap(monterey) + geom_tile(data=montereyCrimes, aes(x = long, y = lat, alpha = Frequency), 
                      fill = "red") + theme(axis.title.y = element_text(), 
                                            axis.title.x = element_text())
```
